class.name: MediaPipeFaceLandmarkerResult
class.description: The hand landmarks detection result from [MediaPipeFaceLandmarker]. Each element represents a single face detected in the image.

method.name: has_face_blendshapes
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if the result has [member face_blendshapes].

method.name: has_facial_transformation_matrixes
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if the result has [member facial_transformation_matrixes].

members.member: The detected face landmarks in normalized image coordinates.
